page.title: 05Housing,Earlston
page.content: Most of the houses in Earlston are terraced.The houses in the new scheme and in the High Street are terraced. Some of the houses are semi_ detached.Nearly all of these houses have two storeys. There are a few bungalows and some detached stone built houses. The most popular type of building material in the olden days was stone. Nowadays builders and bricklayers use bricks and concrete blocks.The roofs in Earlston are mainly covered with slates. All houses have proper plumbing. Some of them have central heating but all of them have electric lights.Gas is quite popular.Many houses have gas fires,heaters and cookers. Most houses have gardens where they can plant and grow flowers and vegetables.
